title: WTF This new client has WAYY too many glitches.
body: This is driving me NUTS. Last night and this morning I was itching to play some league as I haven't played a while so I was hoping to get back into it, I launch a game last night and I get through the champion select and everything, then transition into the game and there's a glitch where there is a blue circle and it's not running correctly, so I close it... but I can still hear the announcers and all the ingame sounds and stuff, even though the game isn't open... for some odd reason my computer detected the game as open when it was closed as I could hear everything, so when I tried to join in again so I could play, to my horror it said the game was already open... crrraaaap. I gave up and thought I'd try again this morning, so I launch and I have to wait 20 minutes -_- not cool. So I get into a draft pick, and it's my turn to ban aaannd I cannot see any champions whatsoever (the champion screen in the middle is blank)... the time was ticking down and it would not allow me to ban a champion, so it kicked me and I had to wait AGAIN. This is sooooo frustrating I feel like giving up, the game literally keeps glitching and punishing me for its own glitches... I hate this so much!!

replies.body:
Hopefully your intelligence lead you to:
1. Launch the legacy client
2. Realise it is an open beta
3. Report the bugs

I never install new software if the old one is working to a satisfactory level. Heck I still use Winamp 2.09 (1999) and Excel 97. Why update if newer versions only cause problems and are not worth it?
That's why I still play on the legacy client, they said they'll fix everything by next year so just play on the old client.
